---
title: "20: Reproducibility"
---

* * *

To reproduce the project, follow these instructions:

1. Ensure you have Python installed on your system.
2. Clone the project repository from [here](https://github.com/stats-at-Rutgers/group-project-collective_creators.git).
3. Navigate to the project directory in your terminal or command prompt.
4. Install the required Python packages by running the following command: pip install -r requirements.txt
5. Once all dependencies are installed, you can execute the project code to get the results.
